location: Victor Clothing Company: 240 south Broadway, Los Angeles, CA 90012
description: Artist: Eloy Torrez, assisted by Bob Grigas. Mexican-born actor Anthony Quinn dancing in a manner reminiscent of his role as Zorba the Greek. Behind him is the Bradbury Building, an architectural landmark that is directly across the street.  1st Photo: © Gil Ortiz (2015), 2nd Photo: ©  Kelly Hilker (2011)
